description: Seared beef and chunky spiced kidney beans make these tostadas delicious and filling.
keywords: Taco,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Avocado,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Kidney Bean Tostadas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 limes, juice of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan on high heat and brush the steak with oil. Sear for 2 minutes on each side for rare and set aside to rest.
Heat the rest of the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the tortilas for 1 minute, flipping halfway through. Drain on kitchen paper.
Tip the garlic, kidney beans and chilli powder into the pan used to cook the steak and cook for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the lime juice, remove from the heat and mash with the back of a fork.
Spread each tostada with kidney bean mix, slice the steak thinly and place on top with slices of avocado. Serve with lime wedges.
